title: how does typoholism affect you?
content:
today i was lurking the itrawebz for some new music to check out.  
I ended up downloading an album purely based on the fact that it was set in  
Feijoa Display... I think i need help.

for those who are interested, here's a link to the cover [http://ghostly.com/releases/alpinisms](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020062510/http:/ghostly.com/releases/alpinisms "http://ghostly.com/releases/alpinisms")

haven't checked out the music yet.
author: victor ivanov

comments.content: As Erik Spiekermann said, typoholism is a disease, but it is not fatal. Whew.
